summary: Emily Parker is haunted by visions of a woman from the past soon after receiving an antique engagement ring from her fiancé.
cast: Anne Heche|Kathleen Quinlan|Chris Sarandon|Eva Longoria|David Andrews|Jonathan LaPaglia|Kate Jennings Grant|Leigh Jones|Gary Grubbs|Don Brady|Ryan Rilette|Deneen Tyler|Michael Arata|Amanda Baker|Kyle Clements|Dane Rhodes|Carol Sutton|Rachel Brewer|Mike Mayhall|Lisa Calhoun|Jude Cambise|Ryan Catalanotto|Frazier Hicks|Tara Kleinpeter|Coleman 'Coley' Laffoon|Dixie Louviere|Matthew Nolan|Ross Rouillier
title: La muerte no miente
